entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 21.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
